headline.0: Planes, Trains and Cars: Cartels Take Over the Travel Industry

short_description.0: If airlines and car rental companies want to increase market share, the big guys should have to earn it by winning the business and loyalty of their customers; not by gobbling up competitors or driving them out of business
short_description.1: We all want a vacation, but many people think they can't afford it. You can afford it! And I'm going to tell you how.

authors.0:
Hillary Adler, Contributor
Poet, writer, travel blogger, politics junkie
